name: create_circles_in_sketch
description: Creates circles in a specified sketch within a specified component in Fusion 360. Each circle is created at a point provided in the point_list, with its diameter specified by the corresponding element in circle_diameter_list.

component_name.description: The name of the component in the current design.

sketch_name.description: The name of the sketch inside the specified component.

items.description: A list representing an XYZ point.

point_list.description: A list of lists, each representing an XYZ point (x, y, z) where a circle will be created.

circle_diameter_list.description: A list of diameters for the circles, corresponding to each point in point_list.

returns.description: A message indicating the success or failure of the circle creation.

name: create_new_component
description: Creates a new component inside a specified parent component in Fusion 360. The parent component is identified by its name. If the parent component name matches the root component of the design, the new component is created in the root component.

parent_component_name.description: The name of the parent component where the new component will be created.

component_name.description: The name to be assigned to the new component.

name: create_polygon_in_sketch
description: Creates a polygon in an existing sketch within a specified parent component in Fusion 360. The polygon is formed by connecting a series of points provided in the point_list.

parent_component_name.description: The name of the parent component where the polygon will be created.

sketch_name.description: The name of the existing sketch where the polygon will be created.

items.description: A tuple representing an XY point (x, y).

point_list.description: A list of tuples, each representing an XY point (x, y) to be included in the polygon.

returns.description: A message indicating the success or failure of the polygon creation.

name: create_rectangles_in_sketch
description: Creates rectangles in a specified sketch within a specified component in Fusion 360 using addCenterPointRectangle. Each rectangle is defined by a center point (from center_point_list) and a size (width, height) from rectangle_size_list. A corner point is calculated automatically from the center and half the width and height, and two distance dimensions (horizontal and vertical) are applied.

component_name.description: The name of the component in the current design.

sketch_name.description: The name of the sketch inside the specified component.

items.description: A list representing an XYZ point (x, y, z).

center_point_list.description: A list of center points in 3D space for each rectangle to be created.

items.description: A list representing the width and height of the rectangle.

rectangle_size_list.description: A list of [width, height] pairs, corresponding to each center point in center_point_list.

returns.description: A message indicating the success or failure of the rectangle creation.

name: create_sketch
description: Creates a sketch within a specified component on a specified plane in Fusion 360. The plane can be xy, xz, or yz.

component_name.description: The name of the component where the sketch will be created.

sketch_name.description: The name for the new sketch to be created.

sketch_plane.description: The plane on which the sketch will be created. Possible values are 'xy', 'xz', 'yz'. Default is 'xy'.

returns.description: A message indicating the success or failure of the sketch creation.

name: delete_component
description: Deletes a component from the current Fusion 360 design based on the given component name.

component_name.description: The name of the Fusion 360 component object to be deleted.

name: extrude_largest_profile
description: Selects the largest profile in a specified sketch within a component and extrudes it by a given distance. The component and sketch are identified by their names.

component_name.description: The name of the component in the current design containing the sketch.

sketch_name.description: The name of the sketch inside the specified component.

extrusion_distance.description: The distance to extrude the selected profile, in the current units of the design.

name: find_component_by_name
description: Searches for a component in the active Fusion 360 design. The function_name can be a single name or a hierarchical path represented by names separated by colons, indicating a path from a parent component to a nested child component.

function_name.description: The name or hierarchical path of the component to search for, with names separated by colons if applicable.

name: get_design_as_json
description: Collects information about the active Fusion 360 design (including components, bodies, sketches, joints, and nested occurrences) and returns a JSON-encoded string describing the entire structure.

returns.description: A JSON-encoded string representing the structure of the current design, including name, bodies, sketches, joints, and nested occurrences for each component.

name: get_design_parameters_as_json
description: Collects all parameters from the active Fusion 360 design and returns a JSON-formatted string. Each parameter includes its name, unit, expression, numeric value, and comment. The resulting JSON structure contains an array of parameter objects, making it easy to review and utilize parameter data.

returns.description: A JSON-encoded string listing all parameters in the active design, including name, unit, expression, value, and comment for each parameter.

name: get_model_parameters_by_component_as_json
description: Gathers model parameters from each component in the current Fusion 360 design, organizing them in a hierarchical structure that matches the assembly structure. Model parameters include any input parameter to features or construction geometry (e.g., hole diameters, extrusion distances, etc.). Returns a JSON-encoded string with design and parameter details such as name, expression, unit, value, and comment, grouped by component and sub-component.

returns.description: A JSON-encoded string representing the hierarchical structure of the current design’s components and their associated model parameters.

name: get_root_component_name
description: Retrieves the name of the root component in the current Fusion 360 design.

name: import_dxf_to_component
description: Imports a DXF file into a specified target component on its XY plane in Fusion 360. The function renames the new sketch to match the name of the DXF file, excluding the file extension.

target_component.description: The target component in Fusion 360 where the DXF file will be imported.

dxf_file_path.description: The file path of the DXF file to be imported.

name: import_fusion_component
description: Imports a FusionArchive file into a specified parent component within the current Fusion 360 design.

parent_component_name.description: The name of the parent component in the current design where the FusionArchive file will be imported.

file_path.description: The local file path to the FusionArchive file to be imported.

returns.description: A message indicating the success or failure of the import operation.

name: move_component_to_point
description: Moves an occurrence of a specified component to a new point within the Fusion 360 design. The function tries to capture the design's position after moving the component occurrence.

component_name.description: The name of the component whose occurrence is to be moved.

new_point.description: The new XYZ point (x, y, z) to move the component occurrence to.

returns.description: A message indicating the success or failure of the component occurrence movement.

name: rename_component

component.description: The name of the Fusion 360 component to be renamed.

new_name.description: The new name to assign to the component.

description: Renames a specified component in Fusion 360 to a new name.

name: set_parameter_value
description: Sets the value of a specified parameter in the active Fusion 360 design to a new numeric value. If the parameter doesn't exist or is read-only, an error is returned. Otherwise, a success message is returned.

parameter_name.description: The name of the parameter to update.

new_value.description: The new numeric value to set.

returns.description: A message indicating whether the parameter was successfully updated.

name: test_sketch
description: Selects the largest profile in a specified sketch within a component and extrudes it by a given distance. The component and sketch are identified by their names.

component_name.description: The name of the component in the current design containing the sketch.

sketch_name.description: The name of the sketch inside the specified component.

extrusion_distance.description: The distance to extrude the selected profile, in the current units of the design.
